name.description: Name or label for the email mailbox

id.description: Unique identifier for the email mailbox

support_email.description: Email address for support related to the mailbox

group_id.description: ID of the group associated with the email mailbox

product_id.description: ID of the product/service associated with the mailbox

default_reply_email.description: Default email address set for replies from this mailbox

custom_mailbox.description: Flag indicating if the mailbox is a custom mailbox

access_type.description: Type of access for the email mailbox (e.g., IMAP, POP3)

incoming.description: Incoming email server settings (e.g., server address, port)

mail_server.description: SMTP server for sending emails from this mailbox

port.description: Port number for the incoming email server

use_ssl.description: Flag indicating if SSL should be used for email server connections

delete_from_server.description: Flag indicating if emails are deleted from the server after retrieval

authentication.description: Type of authentication required for the mailbox (e.g., basic, oauth)

username.description: Username for authentication to the email mailbox

password.description: Password for authentication to the email mailbox
